card1.title: What if I have no trading knowledge and investment experience?
card1.description: They are not needed. Our algorithm automates most of the processes. You use a ready-made solution, making a profit. In doing so, you learn new things and become an expert yourself. A team of experienced professionals will help you deal with complex issues and will gladly share all the knowledge.

card2.title: Will I be able to start with little money?
card2.description: Yes. We will calculate the most profitable strategies based on your capabilities. This will allow you to make the most of your available budget.

card3.title: How big is the risk that I will lose everything?
card3.description: There is always risk in investments. We only offer a tool that allows you to invest conveniently, quickly and with high returns. This tool has been tested and shows its effectiveness, including in our portfolios. But all decisions about your investments are made only by you, and the responsibility for them also lies with you.

card4.title: Does it take a long time to invest?
card4.description: No. You do not have to quit your job and monitor quotes all day. Investments are profitable even if you do nothing.
